# docker_hub_repository_team_permission (Resource)

Manages Docker Hub repository team permissions.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `namespace` (String) The Docker Hub namespace (organization name).
- `permission` (String) The permission level. Valid values: read, write, admin.
- `repository` (String) The repository name.
- `team_name` (String) The team name.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource (namespace/repository/team_name).
